title: Emerald Kundan Bridal Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
features: This magnificent 4-layer Haaram features exquisite Kundan setting, meticulously handcrafted with traditional Telugu artistry. The central pendant showcases a captivating emerald surrounded by intricate floral Kundan work. Delicate gold balls (gundla) cascade from the pendant and second strand, adding a touch of auspicious charm. The layers are designed with varying lengths to create a cascading effect, enhancing the overall grandeur. Features nakshi work detailing for a heritage touch.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece for any formal occasion where you want to exude timeless elegance.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of radiant gold, vibrant emeralds, and shimmering Kundan stones creates a mesmerizing effect. The intricate design and superior quality materials ensure that this piece will be treasured for generations to come. A true heirloom piece embodying cultural significance and unparalleled beauty.
